name: Great Luck
desc:
Fortuitous timing
Wishes: Dreams come true
Relationships: Have no hesitation
Academics: Hard work shall bear fruit
Work: Fortunes shines

name: Fair Luck
desc:
Improved opportunities
Wishes: Favorable timing
Relationships: No need for concern
Academics: A chance for devotion
Work: New things bring benefits

name: Good Luck
desc:
Good conditions
Wishes: No obstacles
Relationships: Someone is close
Academics: Do not rush to success
Work: Things seem bright

name: Average Luck
desc:
Take caution
Wishes: Give consideration
Relationships: Opportunity is not far
Academics: Do not push yourself
Work: Reflect on expenses

name: Slight Luck
desc:
Consider timing
Wishes: Do not be hasty
Relationships: Wait for an opportunity
Academics: Refrain from slacking
Work: Caution is key
